notice.ch: 大四生選修須取得系主任同意，詳情請見化學系網頁公告。

remark.ch: 大四生選修須取得系主任同意，詳情請見化學系網頁公告。

goal.ch: 學習近代化學研究的發展，使學生了解最新的發展。
goal.en: establish the ability to read most recent literature relevant in the field of material and analytical chemistry

outline.ch: “每星期由3位研究生輪流報告。報告25 分鐘, 發問問題 5分鐘。每位研究生可請指導教授指定要報告的 Paper或自己選擇。儘量避免選擇 Review or Communication Paper。Paper儘量選擇自點數較高的 SCI期刊。報告次序: 碩二，碩一。缺席或請假請出示指導教授簽名。由於報告時間較短，故報告品質將嚴格要求。當週報告的同學請到系上借 Notebook Computer。“
outline.en: “Three graduate students report each week..Report 25 minutes and ask questions for 5 minutes.“

gradMethod.ch: “Performance of Presentation: 60％ Abstract: 10％ Neat Slides: 20％ 學習態度及發問問題: 10％“
gradMethod.en: “Performance of Presentation: 60％ Abstract: 10％ Neat Slides: 20％ Attitude toward learning and asking questions: 10％“

officeHour.en: Will announed in the first class

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch: 系所:限化學學系碩士班。年級:限一年級。學號:限雙號。
en: Department:MSc in Chemistry only.Year:First Year only.Student ID:even numbers Only.
